name: MØN
description:
This game is about Master Of Nothing. The alien who can control Black Holes! Levels are procedural generated but very less amount of rooms available.

Have no time to finish it, sorry =(

Controls

Arrows - move
Z - create black hole (only when you close to special sign)
X - push nearby enemy into black hole

Tips

- black hole kill player so be careful, don't stay AT sign when summon it
- black hole blocks powerlines and overload generator recievers
- generator is crushes without recievers
